## Delay.multiTap() method

Takes an array of offsets relative to current write position, calls [Delay.tap()](./dsp.delay.tap.md) for each, writes results to `out` and returns it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiTap(t: ArrayLike<number>, out?: T[]): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  t | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> |  |
|  out | <code>T[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T[]`
